remarks: The ordered power series structure is a totally ordered set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jan-2015.)
statement:
opsrso.o $e |- O = ( ( I ordPwSer R ) ` T ) $.
opsrso.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. V ) $.
opsrso.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Toset ) $.
opsrso.t $e |- ( ph -> T C_ ( I X. I ) ) $.
opsrso.w $e |- ( ph -> T We I ) $.
opsrso.l $e |- .<_ = ( lt ` O ) $.
opsrso.b $e |- B = ( Base ` O ) $.
opsrso $p |- ( ph -> .<_ Or B ) $.
